game_description: An energy-collecting shooting game. You collect energy from enemies that block your path. We aimed for a feeling of exhilaration when absorbing energy. Please experience the comfort of absorbing energy! • Method of operation For hand tracking only. The move is automatic. Aim to escape from the base with two operations: 1.Attack mode - Either hand is a Paper The pointer will come out. You can start or attack the enemy by hitting the pointer. Attack and get energy from your enemies. 2.Absorption mode - Both hands are Paper If there is energy in the scene, it will absorb the energy. Collect a lot of energy. (It cannot be absorbed after a certain distance.) • How to proceed with the game: 1.Start Start when the gauge of the START icon is full. 2.GamePlay Once started, the move is automatic. When hit by an enemy bullet, the energy is reduced. 3.GameOver If you cannot escape by the time limit, the game is over. 4.GameClear The game is cleared if you pass through the door by the time limit.
